title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging        NPS Photo/P. Krocek   Â    Lodging within and around Glen Canyon NRA Hotel rooms inside Glen Canyon Recreation Area on the lake are available at Wahweap and Bullfrog. Housekeeping units (three bedroom single-wide trailers) are available at Halls Crossing, Bullfrog and Hite. To make lodging reservations at Wahweap or Bullfrog phone: 1-800-528-6154 or go online at www.lakepowell.com. Lodging outside the park There are numerous motels in Page, Arizona. Visit the Page-Lake Powell Chamber of Commerce for more information, 928-645-2741 or online at http://pagechamber.com/.
